ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl n H.
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA a : ad la : prec_list a0 : ad ls1, ls2 : prec_list hd : term tl : term_list n : nat H : rec_list_terms d (prec_cons a0 ls1 ls2) (tcons hd tl) n || rec_term d a hd n && rec_list_terms d la tl n = true Unable to unify "rec_list_terms d (prec_cons a0 ls1 ls2) (tcons hd tl) n || rec_term d a hd n && rec_list_terms d la tl n = true" with "rec_list_terms d (prec_cons a0 ls1 ls2) (tcons hd tl) n = true".

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl n H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl n H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl n H.
destruct (rec_term d a hd n) eqn:Hterm, (rec_list_terms d la tl n) eqn:Hlist.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet ++: Current bullet ++ is not finished.

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl n H.
destruct (rec_term d a hd n) eqn:Hterm, (rec_list_terms d la tl n) eqn:Hlist.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet ++: Current bullet ++ is not finished.

original: intros d a la ls hd tl n H. simpl in H. destruct ls. - left. apply H. - simpl in H. destruct (tcons hd tl). * discriminate H. * destruct (rec_term d a hd n) eqn:Hterm, (rec_list_terms d la tl n) eqn:Hlist. ++ right. split; auto. ++ left. auto. ++ left. auto. ++ left. auto.
